name: CJ Freestone / Sam "Samson" Weinfeld - 2013
description:
2.2 Inches

256 Line Rainbow Retti by Samson.
CJ Freestone Fume Implosion.

Sam assembled the marble from CJ's half adding his Reticello design using Heavy Blue Lep on the border.

Custom Order  - 1/1

name: Josh Sable - 2009
description:
1.71 Inches

Very rare - Inside out fume tube collapse.

True one-of-one for the collection now 10 years old.

name: Andrew Tischler - 2013
description:
"This is a marble I flameworked, this is my 5th year blowing glass. I call this design a fractal, although its a variation on a reticello. The back is my "Mike Gong Stack"  or more traditionally known as a dot stack."

This was a very special marble of which the proceeds went to help rebuild the Tiemeyer's family home.   

1.25" / 32mm
